Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: "Hides/unhides your name from the who list.\\r\\n\\r\\nWhen you are in the hidden state (+darked), you will appear as invisible to regular account bodies, on the who list. To anyone a guide or a host (coder, plotter, host, et al.), you will still appear on the who list under the category \\"Characters dark:\\" or \\"Characters dark and idle:\\""
